FuncDef: The display multicast bas-policy out user command displays the multicast BAS policy and bandwidth statistics of specified users.
CLIs: display multicast bas-policy out user { <user-id> | reach-threshold <value> }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a bandwidth limit threshold.
The value is an integer ranging from 80 to 100, in percentage.

Specifies a user ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 3145727.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display multicast bas-policy out user reach-threshold 90
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
display multicast bas-policy out user this command displays the multicast BAS policy information of a specified user, including the bandwidth limit policy index, total maximum bandwidth, maximum bandwidth of each level, and used bandwidth of each level.
display multicast bas-policy out user reach-threshold this command displays the bandwidth usage that has reached a specified bandwidth limit threshold.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
